channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [PDFBOX-1942] Regression: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException in shading
item.description:
I get this with the attached file, and this didn't happen a few days ago (in PDFBOX-1877):

25.02.2014 22:25:33.416 WARN [main] org.apache.pdfbox.util.PDFStreamEngine:552 - java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 1, Size: 1
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 1, Size: 1
at java.util.ArrayList.rangeCheck(ArrayList.java:635)
at java.util.ArrayList.get(ArrayList.java:411)

{R9}' does not exist in the current page's resources

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Same problem with the asy-gouraud file:
